channel.title: What I learned about Serverless from building a Pokémon Radar on heapcon ⬣ a new conference by heapspace

item.title: Laura Carvajal
item.description: Laura has been a Software Engineer for 15 years and is currently a Principal Engineer at The Financial Times. She led the accessibility team for FT.com in 2016 and currently works in the Internal Products team at FT tech.
